T11bsa022_u:4: na ca kṛtyakriyā yuktā vijñaptiryadi nārthataḥ // Vvṛ_2 //
T11bsa022_u:9: tiraścāṃ sambhavaḥ svarge yathā ca narake tathā /
T11bsa022_u:10: na pretānāṃ yatastajjaṃ duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti te // Vvṛ_5 //
T11bsa022_u:11: yadi tatkarmabhistatra bhūtānāṃ sambhavastathā iṣyate pariṇāmaśca kiṃ vijñānasya neṣyate // Vvṛ_6 //
T11bsa022_u:13: tatraiva neṣyate yatra vāsanā kiṃ nu kāraṇaṃ // Vvṛ_7 //
T11bsa022_u:16: nāstīha satva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ yataḥ svabījādvijñaptiryadābhāsā pravartate /
T11bsa022_u:20: na tadekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
T11bsa022_u:21: na ca te saṃhatā yasmātparamāṇurna sidhyati // Vvṛ_11 //
T11bsa022_u:25: na cānavayavatvena tatsaṃyogād na sidhyati // Vvṛ_13 //
T11bsa022_u:27: chāyāvṛtī kathaṃ vā anyo na piṇḍaścenna tasya te // Vvṛ_14 //
T11bsa022_u:29: vicchinnānekavṛttiśca sūkṣmānīkṣā ca no bhavet // Vvṛ_15 //
T11bsa022_u:30: pratyakṣabuddhiḥ svapnādau yathā sa ca yadā tadā /
T11bsa022_u:31: na so 'rtho dṛśyate tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ kathaṃ mataṃ // Vvṛ_16 //
T11bsa022_u:32: uktaṃ yathā tadābhāsā vijñaptiḥ smaraṇaṃ tataḥ /
T11bsa022_u:35: middhenopahataṃ cittaṃ svapne tenāsamaṃ phalaṃ // Vvṛ_18 //
T11bsa022_u:39: manodaṇḍo mahāvadyaḥ kathaṃ vā tena sidhyati // Vvṛ_20 //
T11bsa022_u:40: paracittavidāṃ jñānamayathārthaṃ kathaṃ yathā svacittajñānam ajñānādyathā buddhasya gocaraḥ vijñaptimātratāsiddhiḥ svaśaktisadṛśī mayā /
T11bsa022_u:41: kṛteyaṃ sarvathā sā tu na cintyā buddhagocaraḥ // Vvṛ_22 //
